headline: FleishmanHillard Launches Global Executive Advisory to Help Brands Navigate an Uncertain Marketplace
summary: FleishmanHillard today announced the launch of its Global Executive Advisory, a strategic network of senior counselors designed to help C-suite leaders navigate special situations, high-impact issues and transformative change. The group is now operational and actively engaging with clients managing risk and opportunity in the face of global volatility, geopolitical uncertainty and increasing stakeholder scrutiny.
